name: Warp Drive Delivery
description:
Control 2 astronauts to navigate around asteroids! One is outside tethered to the ship, and the other is inside controlling the ship and the tether

CONTROLS:

GAMEPLAY:

OBJECTIVE:

Outside Buddy Controls:

  • Hold "LMB" to move 
  • Click "RMB" when close to fire to repair
  • Click "RMB" when close to turret to enter Gunning Mode
  • When in Gunning Mode, click LMB to shoot a laser toward the cursor

Inside Buddy Controls:

  • Use "A" and "D" keys to move left and right
  • Press "Spacebar" to interact with either the Pilot's Chair or the Tether Lever
  • When in Pilot Mode, use "WASD" to move the ship.
    • Press "Spacebar" to exit Pilot Mode
  • When in Tether Control Mode, use "A" and "D" to move the tether CCW and CW.
    • Press "Spacebar" to exit Tether Control Mode

Objective:

  • Survive through the never-ending horde of asteroids while waiting for the Warp Drive to charge! (We didn't get to implementing this in time, but you can see the number and the gauge go up!)
  • Hull damage slows down the Warp Drive charge, so repair it as quickly as you can! Too much Hull damage is also bad! (We didn't get to implementing this in time either.)

Post-Jam Goals:

  • Implement winning and losing!
  • Put in our very own created music!
  • More VFX! 

Credits:

  • Aaron Deblois: Character models and props
  • Austin Agular: Particle/VFX Systems 
  • Kevin Sorensen  @trashkev: Environment art and UI
  • Kyle Engelmann: Programming
  • Perry K yt:pikiperry: Porgramming
